descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Future Earth is a dystopian battleground. Robots are at war with each other. Play as a Sentient Intelligent robot in this fast-paced, shooter.

Built from the ground up, specifically for Mobile VR, HAX offers highly intuitive controls, groundbreaking weapon mechanics, super-sampled graphics, and dedicated servers.

[media]

**Play with or against your friends in the multiplayer mode, running on dedicated servers. Team up and defeat the enemy team with no mercy!**

[media]

**Earn your rank insignia and wear it for all to see as you climb your way to the top of the leaderboards.**

[media]

**Customize your weapons, attachments, characters, camos, and more!**

[media]

**Humans have mysteriously disappeared, leaving two warring, robot factions; The UNR (United Nations Robotics), a peacekeeping division who will stop at nothing, they will even use force to spread peace; and the 404, a corrupt military group spreading their infectious code.**

[media]

**What is HAX? It’s a radioactive, programmable gas used to power weapons and hack other robots by firing data packets. One simple HAX Mag can be loaded into a firearm, turned into a sword, thrown as a grenade, or used to hack objectives and other players. This all-in-one Mag makes HAX incredibly easy to learn and fun to play.**

[media]
